tvestergaard.fog.presentation

Class Notifications

  • java.lang.Object
    • tvestergaard.fog.presentation.Notifications
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Notification>

    public class Notifications
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Notification>
    Helper for sending notifications to the users of the site.

      • record

        public void record()
        Records the current number of getNotifications. The hasNew() method can then be used to see if the number of getNotifications in the queue has changed.
        See Also:
        hasNew()

      • hasNew

        public boolean hasNew()
        Checks if new getNotifications has been added to the queue since the last time the record() method was called.
        Returns:
        True is new getNotifications has been added to the queue since the last call to record().
        See Also:
        record()
